channel.title: App on Investment tools and ideas
channel.description: Recent content in App on Investment tools and ideas

item.title: Introducing the dividend comparison app
item.description: Why dividends? We tend to focus a lot on what happens right now and forget about the bigger picture. That is no different when investing in stocks. We are easily impressed by the recent rise in price and forget about why investors buy stocks. Well, the reason is that they hope that by owning a part of the company they get a part of the profits the company makes: Dividends!
